Package org.asteroid.math

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
org.asteroid.math.Matrix
public class Matrix extends Object
This class has functions that help in matrix calculation and an instance of this class represents a matrix

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    int[]
    order
    This array always has size 2 and index 0 represents number of rows and index 1 represents number of column

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(int n, boolean isUnitMatrix)
      Creates a new instance of class Matrix which is a square matrix. If isUnitMatrix is true then a unit matrix is generated else a null matrix is generated
      Parameters:
      n - order of the square matrix
      isUnitMatrix - unit matrix is generated if true else a null matrix is generated

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(int m, int n)
      Creates a null matrix of order m Ã— n
      Parameters:
      m - Number of rows
      n - Number of columns

  • Method Details

    • add

      public Matrix add(Matrix matrix)
      Adds given instance of matrix in argument and current instance of matrix and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
      Parameters:
      matrix - Another matrix that is to be added
      Returns:
      new instance of matrix containing sum of current instance of matrix and instance of matrix given in parameter

    • subtract

      public Matrix subtract(Matrix matrix)
      Subtract the given instance of matrix in argument from current instance of matrix and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
      Parameters:
      matrix - Another matrix that is to be subtracted
      Returns:
      New instance of matrix having the given instance of matrix in argument subtracted from current instance of matrix

    • multiply

      public Matrix multiply(Matrix matrix)
      Multiplies current instance of matrix with the instance of matrix given in the argument and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
      Parameters:
      matrix - matrix that is to be multiplied
      Returns:
      New instance of matrix having product of current instance of matrix with the instance of matrix given in the argument

      public Matrix multiply(double num)
      Multiply a scalar value with the current instance of class and returns a new instance of class Matrix containing the result
      Parameters:
      num - Number that is to be multiplies to the matrix
      Returns:
      New instance of matrix having the product of current instance of class with a scalar value.

    • elementaryTransform

      public Matrix elementaryTransform(boolean transformRow, int rcm, int rcn, double scalar)
      Performs elementary transformation on the given Matrix
      CASE 1: if transformRow is true then it performs Râ‚˜ â†’ Râ‚˜ + cRâ‚™ where rcm represents the value of Râ‚˜, rcn represents the value of Râ‚™ and scalar represents the value of c
      CASE 2: if transformRow is false then it performs Câ‚˜ â†’ Câ‚˜ + cCâ‚™ where rcm represents the value of Câ‚˜, rcn represents the value of Câ‚™ and scalar represents the value of c
      Parameters:
      transformRow - row is transformed if true else column is transformed
      rcm - row or column number that is to be transformed
      rcn - row or column whose multiple is to be added to the row or column that is to be transformed
      scalar - a constant that is to be multiplied to rcn
      Returns:
      An elementary transformed matrix according to given condition

    • interchange

      public Matrix interchange(boolean interchangeRows, int rc1, int rc2)
      Returns a new instance of matrix with an interchange in two row or column. If value of interchangeRow is true then rows are interchanged else column are interchanged
      Parameters:
      interchangeRows - if true then rows are interchanged else column are interchanged
      rc1 - first row or column number
      rc2 - second row or column number
      Returns:
      New instance of matrix with an interchange in two row or column.

      public Matrix geTranspose()

      Returns:
      Transpose of current instance of matrix
